00012 string itoa(int i)
00013 {
00014         stringstream ss;
00015         ss << i;
00016         return ss.str();
00017 }
00018 
00019 string itobs(int x, int numBits)
00020 {
00021         stringstream ss;
00022         for (int i = 0; i < numBits; i++)
00023                 ss << ((x & (1 << numBits - i - 1)) ? 1 : 0);
00024         return ss.str();
00025 }

00050 void appmain::betweenStep()
00051 {
00052         GrEvent ev;
00053         bool quit = false;
00054         struct timespec ts, rem;
00055         ts.tv_sec = 0;
00056         ts.tv_nsec = 100000000;
00057         do
00058         {
00059                 state temp = memory[current_state];
00060                 temp.id = 1;
00061                 state st(2, "NEXTSTEP");
00062                 EventSender<state>::send(st);
00063                 EventSender<state>::send(temp);
00064                 while (1)
00065                 {
00066                         nanosleep(&ts, &rem);
00067                         xcomm.lock();
00068                         if (GrEventCheck())
00069                         {
00070                                 GrEventRead(&ev);
00071                                 xcomm.unlock();
00072                                 if (ev.p1 == GrKey_q || ev.p1 == GrKey_Q)
00073                                         exit(0);
00074                                 if (ev.p1 == GrKey_Space)
00075                                 {
00076                                         //next step
00077                                         quit = true;
00078                                         break;
00079                                 }
00080                                 if (ev.p1 == GrKey_f || ev.p1 == GrKey_F)
00081                                 {
00082                                         OneStepForward();
00083                                         break;
00084                                 }
00085                                 if (ev.p1 == GrKey_b || ev.p1 == GrKey_B)
00086                                 {
00087                                         OneStepBack();
00088                                         break;
00089                                 }
00090                         }
00091                         else
00092                                 xcomm.unlock();
00093                 }
00094                 state st2(2, "NEXTSTEP");
00095                 EventSender<state>::send(st2);
00096         } while (!quit);
00097 }
00098 
00099 void appmain::OneStepBack()
00100 {
00101         if (current_state != 0)
00102                 current_state -= 1;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void appmain::OneStepForward()
00106 {
00107         if (current_state != (memory.size() - 1))
00108                 current_state += 1;
00109 
00110 }
00111 
00112 state appmain::GetPrevState()
00113 {
00114         state st;
00115         st.StepName = "NULL";
00116         if (current_state != 0)
00117         {
00118                 st = memory[current_state - 1];
00119         }
00120         return st;
00121 }
